attributes.title: Rooster Teeth: Shopping Games
attributes.caption: Check out all the great holiday merchandise at the Rooster Teeth Store.
attributes.description: Katniss is back and in her biggest adventure ever. Way bigger than the movie that just came out. Like 4 times bigger than that.Make sure to check out the Rooster Teeth store for all your holiday shipping needs.Special thanks to Blazer Tag Adventure Center.

attributes.title: The iBlade Trilogy - Teaser Trailer
attributes.description: In the medieval office of iBlade Inc., a company mole has stolen top-secret plans to sell to a rival company. Now it's up to Russ, a luckless weapons engineer, to track down the mole, save the company, and prove to his co-workers that he isn't a loser... All by 5pm.

attributes.title: Gavin vs. Science
attributes.description: Burnie sits Gavin down for an in-depth discussion of science.

attributes.title: Joel and Matt go to the Opera
attributes.caption: A Double Date Fit for a Man
attributes.description: When Matt and Joel get dragged on a double date to the opera, they bolt and go on an adventure of their own.
attributes.display_title: Joel and Matt go to the Opera

attributes.title: Girls Girls Girls
attributes.description: Miles gets lost in his thoughts thinking about the ladies. Check out more great footage on The Best of RT Shorts DVD!

attributes.title: Max Capacity
attributes.description: Chris, Michael and Jordan get kicked out of their offices.   The new 2014 Scion tC is featured in this short.

attributes.title: RT Shorts Reunion
attributes.description: Gus can't take it anymore.

attributes.title: A View Too Many
attributes.caption: Presented by GAEMS
attributes.description: Gus confronts Chris about his unusual monitor fixation. GAEMS - making gaming possible where no one else can!

attributes.title: Splashdown
attributes.description: Matt kicks off a celebration in the office that he will soon regret.

attributes.title: The iBlade Trilogy Part 1
attributes.description: It's merry times in the medieval offices of iBlade, Incorporated -- demand for their immortal-slaying swords has never been higher! But as a big promotion looms, tenacious engineer Russ stumbles into a plot that may very well destroy the entire company.

attributes.title: The iBlade Trilogy Part 2
attributes.description: With the company's future in jeopardy, Russ delves into the seedy underbelly of iBlade, Inc for answers... and comes face-to-face with their corporate saboteur.

attributes.title: The iBlade Trilogy Part 3
attributes.description: Russ faces a greater threat than he imagined in the action-packed finale to the iBlade Trilogy!

attributes.title: Barenaked Ladies - "Did I Say That Out Loud?" (Official Music Video)
attributes.caption: New recordings available on iTunes at http://Smarturl.it/BNLJuly1
attributes.description: Barenaked Ladies recently digitally released The Long Weekend EP in Canada & a deluxe bonus edition of 'Grinning Streak' in the US! Both feature previously unreleased recordings plus acoustic renditions of select album tracks. BNL head back to the States on their cross country summer tour starting July 17th in Stamford,Ct and wraping up on September 14th. Special VIP tour packages are available.
attributes.display_title: Barenaked Ladies - "Did I Say That Out Loud?" (Official Music Video)

attributes.title: Barenaked Ladies - "Odds Are" (Official Music Video)
attributes.description: Order "Grinning Streak" on iTunes

attributes.title: Behind the Scenes: Barenaked Ladies - "Odds Are"
attributes.description: Watch the Behind the Scenes video for the making of Barenaked Ladies - "Odds Are."Order "Grinning Streak" on iTunes
attributes.display_title: Behind the Scenes: Barenaked Ladies - "Odds Are"

attributes.title: Burnie vs. Harry Potter
attributes.description: Burnie discuses the Harry Potter series in amazing detail.

attributes.title: Slow Mo Love
attributes.description: Gavin gets more than he bargained for when an innocent encounter takes an unexpected romantic turn.

attributes.title: The iPhone Cult
attributes.description: Michael must cope with life as an outcast from The iPhone Cult; the life of a Green Person.

attributes.title: Beard Meeting
attributes.description: Burnie and Blaine search the office for a meeting place until they finally find one: The Beard Room.

attributes.title: 11 Year Anniversary of Rooster Teeth
attributes.description: JJ finds Kerry editing a celebratory video for Rooster Teeth's 11 Year Anniversary.

attributes.title: Amazon Delivery Drone vs. Rooster Teeth Catapult
attributes.caption: Check out all the great holiday merchandise at the Rooster Teeth Store.
attributes.description: With the holidays right around the corner, Rooster Teeth finds effective ways to deliver your orders. Make sure to check out the Rooster Teeth Store for all of your holiday shipping needs.
attributes.display_title: Amazon Delivery Drone vs. Rooster Teeth Catapult
